    • Constructor Detail

      • ChestGUI

        public ChestGUI(java.lang.String name,
                java.lang.String displayName,
                int size,
                GUIItem[] items)
        Creates a new GUI with a custom display name.
        Parameters:
        name - The name of the GUI.
        displayName - The display name of the GUI.
        size - The size of the GUI (1-6).
        items - The GUI items (get the default by ChestGUI.getDefaultGUI()).

      • ChestGUI

        public ChestGUI(java.lang.String name,
                int size,
                GUIItem[] items)
        Creates a new GUI.
        Parameters:
        name - The name of the GUI, also the display name.
        size - The size of the GUI (1-6).
        items - The GUI items (get the default by ChestGUI.getDefaultGUI()).

    • Method Detail

      • register

        public boolean register()
        Registers the GUI to the plugin. A GUI must be registered in order to be used.
        Returns:
        false if a GUI with the same name is registered.

      • unregister

        public boolean unregister()
        Unregisters the GUI. If it is opening to any player, their GUI will be closed.
        Returns:
        true if succeded, false if it is not registered before.

      • isRegistered

        public boolean isRegistered()
        Checks if the GUI has been registered.
        Returns:
        true if it is registered, false if not.

      • getDefaultGUI

        public static GUIItem[] getDefaultGUI()
        Returns the default array of GUIItems.
        Returns:
        A 54-element array of empty GUIItems.

      • setSize

        public void setSize(int size)
        Sets the current size of the GUI.
        Parameters:
        size - If it is smaller than 1, it will be 1; if greater than 6, will be 6.

      • setItem

        public void setItem(int index,
                    GUIItem item)
             throws java.lang.IllegalArgumentException
        Sets the specified GUIItem to another. After that the GUI updates to the players.
        Parameters:
        index - The GUIItem's location.
        item - The new GUIItem.
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - If the index is greater than 53 or smaller than 0.

      • show

        public void show(org.bukkit.entity.Player p)
        Shows the GUI for a player.
        Parameters:
        p - The player.

      • close

        public boolean close(org.bukkit.entity.Player p)
        Closes the GUI for a player.
        Parameters:
        p - The player
        Returns:
        true if suceeded, false if not.
